Primary Domain: Building agent-based market simulation models for price forecasting of real-world stocks and other securities
Programming Language: free evaluation version available for research and experimentation (some limitations but no expiration)
Operating System: No programming skills required. An adaptive form of genetic programming is used to create trading rules. User can select functions to be used in the genetic programming engine.
User Support: Windows 2000, NT 4.0, XP, Vista, 7, 8 or any other platform that supports Microsoft .Net 2.0 or higher
FIPA Compliant: FAQ, documentation, tutorial, examples, forum, email support
Last Update: Up to 3 agent properties can be visualized in real-time using 2D graphics and color

License: also supports discrete event and system dynamics simulations.
